programme.title: Sorry to Bother You
programme.desc: A San Francisco, Cassius Green fait tout pour obtenir un modeste emploi dans une entreprise de télémarketing. L'homme, qui ne parvient plus à régler le loyer du garage que lui loue son oncle, voit ce nouveau poste comme une bénédiction. Mais bien qu'il suive à la lettre le script fourni par ses employeurs, Cassius ne parvient pas à vendre d'encyclopédies à ses interlocuteurs téléphoniques. Sur les conseils de Langston, un vétéran, Cassius, qui est Noir, commence à prendre une voix de Blanc. Le succès est immédiat.

programme.title: Mon frère
programme.desc: Alors que son père vient de mourir, le jeune Andy est confié à la garde de sa grand-mère. Pendant ce temps, Teddy, son frère aîné, accusé d'avoir tué leur père, un personnage violent, est placé dans un centre éducatif fermé, dans l'attente de son jugement. L'adolescent découvre un milieu violent, au sein duquel les éducateurs, parmi lesquels Igor, tentent de canaliser l'énergie des jeunes gens par le sport. Enzo, l'un des jeunes pensionnaires, se montre particulièrement agressif avec Teddy.

programme.title: Parades
programme.desc: Face aux injustices du monde, Margot ne sait plus si l'avenir a un sens. Désabusée, ne croyant plus aux luttes politiques, elle veut s'en remettre au Dardu, une carpe légendaire sensée prédire l'avenir..

programme.title: Une chance sur six
programme.desc: Dans le sud de la France, Hubert Vallon, un antiquaire homosexuel, partage sa vie avec Patricia de Sarneville, une riche héritière de quinze ans son aînée. Tandis qu'elle se consacre aux œuvres caritatives, Hubert préfère les œuvres d’art et les jeux de casino. Vallon rêve de se débarrasser de son épouse. Lorsqu'il fait la connaissance de Gaëtano Campanella, flic célibataire et catholique pratiquant, vivant chez sa mère, l'attraction est immédiate. Gaëtano applique son propre code moral. Aussi machiavéliques l'un que l'autre, les deux hommes ne vont pas tarder à s'affronter.

programme.title: Cinq nuits
programme.desc: Le grand-père de Simon vient de décéder. Il laisse derrière lui sa maison. En accord avec sa sœur, Simon est venu s'occuper de la maison vacante. Sa sœur Clara lui a aussi demandé d'y retrouver un film qu'il aurait tourné au temps des colonies. Sauf que le grenier est fermé. Simon a le sentiment de ne pas être seul dans cette vielle maison.

programme.title: Fugazi
programme.desc: Depuis plus de trois ans, Adèle travaille sur ORBIT, une station spatiale chargée du pilotage des drones sur la planète Terre. Aujourd'hui, tenant entre ses mains deux joysticks, il ne lui reste plus qu'une mission de routine à accomplir pour rejoindre enfin sa famille. A moins qu'un grain de sable ne fasse basculer son destin..

programme.title: Spaceship Earth
programme.desc: L'histoire vraie de "Biosphere 2", la gigantesque réplique de l'écosystème terrestre, construite en 1991, et dans laquelle huit scientifiques se sont isolés pendant deux ans.

programme.title: Les saveurs du succès
programme.desc: Carsten et Maggi, parents de deux adorables enfants, mène une vie de rêve. Le couple, passionné, dirige avec brio le Malus, un restaurant très sophistiqué de Copenhague. Tandis que Maggi compose savamment l'atmosphère de l'établissement, Carsten, chef perfectionniste jusqu'à l'obsession, n'attend fébrilement qu'une chose : la visite d'un inspecteur qui leur permettra enfin de remporter la première étoile du Guide Michelin. Alors que la pression est considérable, une lettre anonyme; destinée à Carsten, est déposée au restaurant. Celle-ci affirme que Maggi est amoureuse d'un autre homme.

programme.title: Suicide Tourist
programme.desc: Le 10 janvier 2019, Max Isaksen, détective pour une compagnie d'assurances, enregistre une courte vidéo au cours de laquelle il affirme qu'il va mettre fin à sa vie. L'homme s'est inscrit au registre de l'hôtel Aurora, un établissement qui propose confidentiellement des solutions de suicide assisté à ses hôtes. Il rencontre rapidement Karen, une des membres du personnel, qui lui demande de se séparer de son téléphone portable avant de lui faire signer une décharge. Tous deux s'envolent ensuite pour une destination inconnue de Max.

Category: Drama|Drama

programme.title: Le dernier gang
programme.desc: Au milieu des années 1970, Simon et ses copains, tous nés à Belleville, à Paris, dévalisent au culot de modestes agences bancaires. Quelques ratés et succès plus tard, ils basculent dans le grand banditisme et se font connaître sous le nom du Gang des postiches. C'est lors d'un braquage que Simon remarque Julie, dont il tombe amoureux. Eprise également, cette dernière accepte de partager sa vie.

programme.title: Little Zombies
programme.desc: Un jour, quatre adolescents se rencontrent par hasard dans un crématorium. En fait, Hikari, Ikuko, Ishi et Takemura viennent tous de perdre leurs parents. Ils devraient être tristes, pourtant ils ne pleurent pas. Dépourvus de toute émotion, ces quatre jeunes décident alors de monter un groupe de rock explosif afin de donner un nouveau sens à leur vie.

programme.title: Lucky Strike
programme.desc: Jung-man, qui doit so'ccuper de sa mère malade, gagne modestement sa vie en faisant le ménage dans un sauna. Tout bascule quand il s'empare d'un gros sac de marque, trouvé dans une consigne du vestiaire et contenant une importante somme d'argent. De son côté, Tae-young, un agent des douanes, ne sait pas comment régler la dette qu'il a contractée auprès de monsieur Park, un impitoyable criminel. Mi-ran, régulièrement battu par son mari violent, ne sait pas comment faire pour s'éloigner de cet homme dangereux.

programme.title: True Blood
programme.sub-title: S1 E7 Tout feu tout flamme

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara Beasley, influenceuse de renom sur Internet, est sur le point de revenir son site à très bon prix à une firme. Ses manières égoïstes rendent la vie impossible à Evie, la nourrice de ses trois enfants.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara a fait des révélations à Nick qui pourraient bien empêcher la signature sur contrat juteux qu'elle doit signer avec la firme américaine. Le monde de Roxanne s'écroule quand Jordan est arrêté pour fraude.

programme.title: Le secret des Kennedy
programme.desc: Frère de John et Bob Kennedy, Ted participe à une régate le week-end du 18 juillet 1969 sur l'île de Chappaquiddick. Après la course, le sénateur du Massachusetts se rend à une fête où sont présents, son cousin et les secrétaires qui ont participé à la campagne présidentielle de Bob Kennedy avant qu'il ne soit assassiné. Avec l'une d'entre-elle, Ted part faire une balade en voiture. Sur la route, il rate un virage et le véhicule tombe dans l'eau. Il en ressort vivant mais pas la secrétaire. Paniqué, Ted préfère prévenir son cousin plutôt que les secours.

programme.title: On verra bien si on se noie
programme.desc: Dans un petit village perdu, trois adolescents désoeuvrés décident de prendre leur vie en mains.

programme.title: Les vacances de Ducobu
programme.desc: Ravi de partir en vacances avec son père, Ducobu déchante. Il se retrouve en effet dans le même camping que Léonie, la meilleure élève de l'école. Son instituteur, monsieur Latouche, y passe lui aussi son été. Lors d'une sortie, Ducobu apprend qu'un trésor est caché dans une île voisine. Il est persuadé de pouvoir le découvrir. De son côté, Latouche est terriblement jaloux d'Esteban, l'animateur du club d'enfants.

programme.title: L'élève Ducobu
programme.desc: L'élève Ducobu n'aime pas l'école. Pour la énième fois, il s'est fait renvoyer et doit s'inscrire dans un nouvel établissement. Le premier jour, il y fait la connaissance de ses camarades, dont la jeune Léonie Gratin, première de la classe. Il rencontre aussi son professeur, le strict et colérique monsieur Latouche. Spécialiste de la triche, Ducobu parvient pour une fois à se faire passer pour un bon élève.

programme.title: L'exercice de l'État
programme.desc: Ministre des Transports de la République française, Bertrand Saint-Jean est appelé en pleine nuit. Un autocar s'est renversé sur une route de campagne. Accompagné de sa directrice de communication, il se rend sur place pour se recueillir et parler aux médias. Gilles, son fidèle et expérimenté chef de cabinet, reste, quant à lui, à Paris. D'autres sujets sensibles réclament l'attention du ministère.

programme.title: Dans Paris
programme.desc: Paul, 30 ans, rompt avec Anna et retourne quelques jours chez son père pour passer ce cap difficile. Son frère Jonathan, jeune homme insouciant, encore étudiant, tente de le sortir de sa déprime. Au cours d'une seule journée ponctuée de diverses rencontres, la famille, y compris la mère qui avait quitté son mari depuis plusieurs années, va se ressouder pour aider Paul à oublier ses pensées suicidaires.

programme.title: Rencontre à Hampstead Park
programme.desc: Emily Walters, une américaine, tient une petite boutique de vêtements à Hampstead Heath, un quartier bourgeois de Londres. Malgré les tentatives répétées de ses amies de lui trouver un nouveaux compagnon, la sexagénaire vit toujours seule depuis la mort de son mari Charles, un personnage infidèle qui la laissée endettée. Dans le même quartier, Donald Horner mène une existence bien différente, dans une petite cabane, vivant d'expédients. Mais celle-ci est menacée par l'arrivée d'un promoteur immobilier désireux de construire dans le quartier.

programme.title: L'échange des princesses
programme.desc: A Versailles, en 1712, le duc d'Anjou, jalousement veillé par madame de Ventadour, devient le nouvel héritier du trône après la mort du duc de Bretagne. En 1722, Louis XV, âgé de 11 ans, est de retour à Versailles, abandonné sept ans plus tôt. Philippe d'Orléans, régent soucieux d'assurer la paix du royaume, souhaite marier Louis XV avec l'infante d'Espagne, Maria Anna Victoria, âgée de 4 ans. Si l'adolescent accepte, Louise-Elisabeth, la fille de Philippe d'Orléans, se refuse, elle, à épouser le prince des Asturies.

programme.title: Marie Stuart, reine d'Ecosse
programme.desc: Dans la seconde moitié du XVIe siècle, Marie Stuart, née catholique et encore enfant, est envoyée en France alors que les protestants se battent pour le contrôle de l'Ecosse. A 15 ans, elle épouse l'héritier du trône de France. A 18 ans, veuve, elle rentre dans une Ecosse dominée par les protestants et gouvernée par son demi-frère, le comte de Moray. Elisabeth est la reine protestante de l'Angleterre et Marie, qui peut légitimement prétendre au trône de par sa naissance, constitue une menace pour la reine.

programme.title: La sorcière de Noël
programme.desc: Comme chaque année, la Befana, la sorcière préférée des petits italiens, parcourt les villes du pays juchée sur son balais pour distribuer, dans les chaussettes laissées par les bambins, des cadeaux aux enfants sages et du charbon pour ceux qui le sont moins. Mais cette nuit, perturbée par un chien, la Befana n'a pas eu le temps de donner son cadeau à un petit garçon. Vingt-cinq ans plus tard, la Befana oeuvre toujours de nuit, pour préparer celle du 6 janvier, tandis qu'elle se dissimule le jour sous celle de Paola, une institutrice.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Après la vive réaction de Jimmy contre le père d'Antigone, Elizabeth décide de le faire transférer en HP.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: La tentative de suicide de Jimmy a des effets dans tout le service. Les infirmiers décident de se mettre en grève.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Les grands-parents de Jimmy débarquent dans le service de l'HP sans savoir qu'il s'y trouve. Sheila entretient une relation ambigüe avec Baya.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila a désobéi et mis en place, en secret, un autre protocole thérapeutique pour Gudz. Le patient réagit mal au traitement, il est en danger de mort imminente. Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: L'homme au chat est passé à l'acte et assassiné son voisin. Se sentant coupable, Sheila décide d'agir et de ne plus obéir aux ordres de sa hiérarchie.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila, Jimmy prennent la direction du Paradis, une petit bourgade où les grands-parents du jeune homme tiennent du maison d'hôtes.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Dans la maison d'hôtes, Sheila doit faire face à la tentative de suicide de Gudz. Cet acte permet à Jimmy de comprendre l'origine de son propre trauma.

programme.title: Ma vie en l'air
programme.desc: Yann, trentenaire célibataire et instructeur dans une compagnie aérienne, a une peur panique de l'avion depuis que sa mère est morte au cours d'un vol, en le mettant au monde. Traînant cette phobie comme un fardeau, il multiplie depuis les échecs sentimentaux en compagnie de Ludo, son meilleur ami. Mais l'existence de Yann va bientôt basculer avec l'arrivée d'Alice, sa charmante nouvelle voisine.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: A Los Angeles, Lou Bloom, criminel qui vit d'expédients, découvre le travail des cameramen, à la recherche d'images explosives. Il s'en procure une et décide de se mettre à son compte. Ses moyens et son matériel sont très limités et ses premiers essais sont hasardeux mais Lou persévère. Il veut se faire une place dans le métier et impressionner Nina Romina, directrice de l'information de Channel 6, une chaine de télévision locale.

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
programme.desc: Quadragénaire, Cal vit depuis vingt-cinq ans avec sa femme Emily, qui lui a donné deux beaux enfants. Sa vie bascule le jour où il apprend que cette dernière l'a trompé. Cal décide de divorcer et devient un homme solitaire. Dans un bar, il rencontre Jacob, un séducteur professionnel qui accumule les conquêtes. Il accepte de prendre Cal sous son aile et de le transformer en don juan. Les résultats ne se font pas attendre.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: Caméléon domestique, Rango est tout sauf aventurier. Le hasard lui joue un mauvais tour et il se retrouve perdu au beau milieu du désert. Après avoir échappé de peu à un aigle, il fait la connaissance de Fève, une femelle lézard. Celle-ci vient d'une petite ville du Far West, Poussière, où elle emmène son nouvel ami. Rango décide de s'y faire passer pour un héros et impressionne les habitants, bien aidé par un heureux concours de circonstances. John, la vieille tortue maire du village, le nomme alors shérif. Il doit enquêter sur la pénurie d'eau qui assèche la ville.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Atteinte de troubles autistiques, la jeune Music vit avec sa grand-mère. S’échappant dans un monde de rêve, Music mène par ailleurs une existence pleine de rituels. Un jour, sa grand-mère meurt. La jeune fille est alors confiée à sa demi-soeur, Zu, une toxicomane récemment sortie de cure. Cette dernière ne sait pas bien comment s’y prendre et commet des maladresses. Lors d’une crise de Music, Ebo, un voisin, propose son aide à Zu. il sait comment calmer l’adolescente. Et Zu trouve un livre laissé par sa grand-mère qui détaille la routine quotidienne de Music.

programme.title: La princesse de Montpensier
programme.desc: En 1562, le roi Charles IX gouverne la France et les guerres de religion font rage. Marie de Mézières, amoureuse d'Henri, duc de Guise, est contrainte par son père d'épouser le prince de Montpensier. Son mari, appelé par le roi à rejoindre la guerre contre les protestants, la laisse en compagnie de son précepteur, le comte de Chabannes, loin du monde, au château de Champigny. La jeune femme, qui ne parvient pas à oublier le duc de Guise, devient malgré elle l’enjeu de passions auxquelles vient se mêler un autre soupirant, le duc d’Anjou, futur Henri III.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila a désobéi et mis en place, en secret, un autre protocole thérapeutique pour Gudz. Le patient réagit mal au traitement, il est en danger de mort imminente. Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: L'homme au chat est passé à l'acte et assassiné son voisin. Se sentant coupable, Sheila décide d'agir et de ne plus obéir aux ordres de sa hiérarchie.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila, Jimmy prennent la direction du Paradis, une petit bourgade où les grands-parents du jeune homme tiennent du maison d'hôtes.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Dans la maison d'hôtes, Sheila doit faire face à la tentative de suicide de Gudz. Cet acte permet à Jimmy de comprendre l'origine de son propre trauma.

programme.title: 120 battements par minute
programme.desc: Au début des années 1990, Nathan participe pour la première fois à une assemblée de l'association Act Up Paris, qui milite pour les droits des séropositifs. Dès le premier soir, il se porte volontaire avec d'autres adhérents pour mener une action spectaculaire contre un laboratoire pharmaceutique. Nathan assiste ensuite à de nombreuses réunions où les échanges sont souvent musclés. Là, il rencontre Sean, à l'engagement et au discours particulièrement virulents. Après avoir distribué des tracts dans un lycée, ils tombent amoureux. Mais Sean est atteint du sida.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara Beasley, influenceuse de renom sur Internet, est sur le point de revenir son site à très bon prix à une firme. Ses manières égoïstes rendent la vie impossible à Evie, la nourrice de ses trois enfants.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara a fait des révélations à Nick qui pourraient bien empêcher la signature sur contrat juteux qu'elle doit signer avec la firme américaine. Le monde de Roxanne s'écroule quand Jordan est arrêté pour fraude.

programme.title: Une femme douce
programme.desc: Dans un village reculé Russie, une femme, déboutée par l'administration pénitentiaire, se voit retourner un colis qu'elle avait destiné quelques temps plus tôt à son mari incarcéré, à l’autre bout du pays, pour un crime qu'il n'a pas commis. Inquiète et désemparée, elle décide d’aller le porter elle-même à son époux. Mais, entre la mauvaise foi des fonctionnaires et la corruption des policiers, son parcours est semé d’embûches et d’humiliations. Arrivé au pénitencier, elle demande alors à voir son mari, mais personne ne peut lui dire où il se trouve.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A Hongkong, J.S. Cheung, officier de police spécialiste du déminage et des explosifs, a depuis longtemps infiltré le gang du redoutable Peng Hong, qui multiplie les braquages hautement préparés. Pour leur nouveau coup, les gangsters ont mis en place un dispositifs de taxis piégés, leur permettant de détourner l'attention des forces de l'ordre. Alors que les braqueurs sèment le chaos, Cheung, dans un de leurs véhicule, fait tout pour les empêcher de nuire. Ce faisant, il parvient à arrêter le jeune frère de Peng Hong alors que celui-ci parvient à prendre la fuite.

programme.title: American Pie : marions-les !
programme.desc: Sous le regard aimant de son papa, Jim s'est décidé à demander Michelle en mariage. Ravi que celle-ci ait accepté, il souhaite lui organiser une fête inoubliable. Mais le chemin jusqu'à l'autel s'annonce semé d'embuches pour le jeune homme. Entre son enterrement de vie de garçon avec ses amis illuminés, la présentation des deux familles et la pression du jour J, il va en voir de toutes les couleurs.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.sub-title: Maigret et la demoiselle de compagnie

programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: On ne meurt que deux fois
programme.desc: Le cadavre de Charles Berliner, un pianiste célèbre, est retrouvé dans la neige près d'une voie ferrée. Le commissaire Bauman charge l'inspecteur Robert Staniland de résoudre l'affaire au plus vite. Celui-ci trouve au domicile du défunt une série d'enregistrements audio où Berliner évoque sa passion pour une certaine Barbara. Quand cette dernière fait irruption dans l'appartement où le pianiste s'était installé, elle avoue à l'inspecteur être la coupable qu'il recherche. Bientôt, Robert Staniland succombe à son tour au charme sulfureux de la jeune femme.

programme.title: Fred
programme.desc: Fred, un grutier au chômage, déprime. Seule sa compagne, Lisa, lui donne le courage de ne pas baisser les bras. Un jour, son ami et voisin, Michel, un routier, disparaît. Par ailleurs, d'étranges inconnus rôdent autour de chez lui.

programme.title: Modern Murder : Quand viendra l'heure
programme.desc: Un collègue de Gorniak et Schnabel est retrouvé battu à mort au pied d'une cité. Les soupçons se portent sur son voisin de palier, Louis Bürger, un ancien détenu dont les empreintes sont retrouvées sur l'arme du crime. Clamant son innocence, Louis tente de s'enfuir avec son épouse, Anna, ainsi que leur fils de 12 ans, Tim, placé en foyer d'accueil..

programme.title: Mi chiamo Francesco Totti
Mein Name ist Francesco Totti
programme.desc: Mi chiamo Francesco Totti: Directed by Alex Infascelli. With Aldair, Alberto Aquilani, Gabriel Batistuta, Alisson Becker. Francesco Totti retraces his entire life whiles watching it on the silver screen together with the audience. Images and emotions flow among key moments of his career, scenes from his personal life and memories he has never shared before." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12142854/","name":"Mi chiamo Francesco Totti","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTQzNzU5NjEtYzhiYy00MWIxLWE3NDctMDcyNjAxOGFlNjFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMDU3NDM3._V1_.jpg","description":"Francesco Totti retraces his entire life whiles watching it on the silver screen together with the audience. Images and emotions flow among key moments of his career, scenes from his personal life and memories he has never shared bef","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12142854/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alessandra-thiele"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderful and Moving","reviewBody":"This is an incredible well made documentary I really enjoyed watching. You don't have to understand or care about football to enjoy this film. It's an incredible portrait of a very unique human being, Francesco Totti, who also happens to be one of the greatest Italian football players of all times and the former captain of AS Roma.I laughed and cried and was completely captivated. I'm pretty sure it cannot be easy to write and direct a documentary about a football player that will nevertheless move and fascinatan audience who is not necessarily interested in the game. In this case the goal was masterfully achieved. I highly recommend watching this film. credits.actor: Kyle MacLachlan, Michael Ontkean, Madchen Amick, Dana Ashbrook, Richard Beymer

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: 3. Staffel, Folge 18: Dale Cooper (Kyle MacLachlan) verschlägt es 25 Jahre in die Vergangenheit. Im Wald trifft er auf Laura Palmer (Sheryl Lee), kurz bevor sie ermordet wurde. Doch seine Hoffnung, den Mord ungeschehen zu machen, erweist sich als trügerisch. Plötzlich ist Laura wieder verschwunden. Im Roten Raum erhält Cooper von Lauras Vater (Ray Wise) den Auftrag, seine Tochter wiederzufinden. Die Suche führt den Special Agent bis nach Texas, wo er in der Kellnerin Carrie (Sheryl Lee) tatsächlich Laura zu erkennen glaubt. - Das Finale des Mystery-Kults: Regie-Exzentriker David Lynch bringt die spektakuläre Forstsetzung seines Serienhits zu einem verblüffenden und geheimnisvollen Ende. 55 Min.USA 2016. Von David Lynch, mit Kyle MacLachlan, Sheryl Lee, Ray Wise, Laura Dern.Ab 16 Jahren.

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: 3. Staffel, Folge 5: Barksdale (Wood Harris) kommt aus dem Gefängnis und wird von Stringer mit einer Willkommensparty empfangen. Colvins (Robert Wisdom) Sonderzone für den Drogenhandel funktioniert nicht wirklich, weil sich die Dealer nicht an sie halten. Colvin benötigt deshalb die Unterstützung durch Daniels' (Lance Reddick) Sonderkommission. - Innovativer, preisgekrönter Krimiserienhit um den knallharten Kampf gegen das Verbrechen in Baltimore. 56 Min.USA 2004, mit Dominic West, Lance Reddick, Larry Gilliard.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: 3. Staffel, Folge 6: Barksdale (Wood Harris) und Stringer Bell (Idris Elba) müssen feststellen, dass der Bereich Immobilienentwicklung seine ganz eigenen Gesetze und Fallen bereit hält. Colvin (Robert Wisdom) befiehlt seinen Leuten, seine Drogenhandelsfreizone bei den Dealern mit aller Gewalt durchzusetzen. - Innovativer, preisgekrönter Krimiserienhit um den knallharten Kampf gegen das Verbrechen in Baltimore. 55 Min.USA 2004, mit Dominic West, Lance Reddick, Larry Gilliard.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: Here and Now
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 7: Ramon sorgt mit seinem Game bei einer Computerspiel-Messe für Aufsehen. Duc lässt seinen Frust an einem Mountainbiker aus. Und Farid überschreitet bei der Behandlung von Ramon eine Grenze. 56 Min.USA 2017. Von Lisa Cholodenko, mit Holly Hunter, Tim Robbins, Daniel Zovatto.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: Here and Now
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 8: Mit seiner wachsenden Obsession gefährdet Farid mehr und mehr seine Karriere und Familie. Greg doziert in einer Vorlesung über den Sinn des Lebens. Und Kristen und Navid planen ihre Rache an Madison. 51 Min.USA 2017. Von Janicza Bravo, mit Holly Hunter, Sosie Bacon, Jerrika Hinton.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: Six Feet Under - Gestorben wird immer
programme.desc: 2. Staffel, Folge 6: Eine wählerische Witwe sorgt bei den Fishers für Aufregung und für ein neues Angebot des Konkurrenten Kroehner. Ruths entfremdete Schwester kommt zu Besuch. Nate und Brenda haben freudige Neuigkeiten. 53 Min.USA 2002. Von Michael Engler, mit Peter Krause, Frances Conroy, Michael C. Hall, Richard Jenkins.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: Six Feet Under - Gestorben wird immer
programme.desc: 2. Staffel, Folge 7: Nate sucht vor einem jüdischen Begräbnis Hilfe bei einem weiblichen Rabbi. Claire trifft auf Tante Sarahs Party einen faszinierenden jungen Mann. Ruth lädt aus Einsamkeit Robbie zum Dinner ein. 54 Min.USA 2002. Von Daniel Attias, mit Peter Krause, Frances Conroy, Michael C. Hall, Richard Jenkins.Ab 16 Jahren.

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 18: Vierte Therapiesitzung mit Sophie. Die junge Sportlerin erscheint nach einer durchzechten Nacht völlig erschöpft zu ihrer Sitzung bei Paul. In diesem Zustand schildert sie dem Therapeuten nach und nach die Einzelheiten, die damals zu ihrem tragischen Unfall führten, und erleidet schließlich einen Zusammenbruch. - Außergewöhnliche Serie, die die Patientengespräche eines Psychotherapeuten belauscht. Grandios: Gabriel Byrne als Seelendoktor mit eigenen Verklemmungen. 24 Min.USA 2007. Von Rodrigo García, mit Gabriel Byrne, Mia Wasikowska.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 19: Vierte Therapiesitzung mit Jake und Amy. Wie gewöhnlich dauert es auch diesmal nicht lange, bis zwischen den verbitterten Eheleuten Jake und Amy (Josh Charles, Embeth Davidtz) die Fetzen fliegen. Für Paul Anlass genug, den Ursachen dieser Feindseligkeiten einmal auf den Grund zu gehen. - Außergewöhnliche Serie, die die Patientengespräche eines Psychotherapeuten belauscht. Grandios: Gabriel Byrne als Seelendoktor mit eigenen Verklemmungen. 24 Min.USA 2007. Von Rodrigo García, mit Gabriel Byrne, Embeth Davidtz, Josh Charles.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 20: Vierte Therapiesitzung mit Paul und Gina. Am Freitag erscheint Paul bestens gelaunt zu seiner eigenen Therapiesitzung bei Gina (Dianne Wiest). Die gute Laune hält allerdings nicht lange an, denn Gina kommt bald auf ein leidiges Thema zu sprechen: die unsichtbare Grenze, die zwischen einem Therapeuten und seinen Patienten bestehen sollte. - Außergewöhnliche Serie, die die Patientengespräche eines Psychotherapeuten belauscht. Grandios: Gabriel Byrne als Seelendoktor mit eigenen Verklemmungen. 26 Min.USA 2007. Von Rodrigo García, mit Gabriel Byrne, Dianne Wiest.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: Divorce
programme.desc: 2. Staffel, Folge 1: Die Scheidung ist offiziell, aber auf die erste Erleichterung folgen ganz reale Probleme: Frances (Sarah Jessica Parker) wird von Schlafstörungen geplagt und Robert braucht dringend einen Job. 28 Min.USA 2017. Von Adam Bernstein, mit Sarah Jessica Parker, Thomas Haden-Church, Jorge Chapa.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: Divorce
programme.desc: 2. Staffel, Folge 2: Während Frances (Sarah Jessica Parker) damit zu kämpfen hat, dass sie von ihrer Tochter Lila verachtet wird, muss Robert (Thomas Haden Church) jetzt seinen Unterhalt als Bauarbeiter verdienen. 28 Min.USA 2017. Von Adam Bernstein, mit Sarah Jessica Parker, Thomas Haden-Church, Talia Balsam.Ab 16 Jahren.

programme.sub-title: S9 E9 S9 E9 Die Abrechnung
programme.desc: Wentworth: Created by Reg Watson, Lara Radulovich. With Kate Atkinson, Katrina Milosevic, Robbie Magasiva, Jacqueline Brennan. Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2433738/","name":"Wentworth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDkxZmFhMDAtMmIyZS00NjAwLThlYjctZDQwMWQwYzdlYWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2433738/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mastas1"},"dateCreated":"2013-05-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great re-make of a classic Aussie drama","reviewBody":"Initial skepticism of trying to remake a classic serial drama like Prisoner was quickly dispelled in the first few minutes of episode 1. This is a completely new take on a long running series from the 1980s with the necessary level of added grit needed in 2013. Whilst employing many of the well known character names; the "new" version has created juicy variations to the originals. Those familiar with the original series should not allow themselves to by put off in the early stages by casting of different types to play the original characters. Ep 1 was edgy, well paced and the acting overall was very good. If Wentworth can maintain the same intensity over its remaining 9 episodes of season 1, it will be a treat to watch. As well as seeing how the initial variation to different main characters develop, perhaps growing into their more familiar traits from the original series as the new series progresses. Clearly this re-make is attempting to tell the background story as to how the likes of Bea Smith, Vera Bennett, Meg Jackson and Frankie Doyle came to be like they were in the original Prisoner series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20056,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-05-01","keywords":"jail,women in prison,prison,female prisoner,female convict","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040753/","name":"Kate Atkinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1319592/","name":"Katrina Milosevic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0535741/","name":"Robbie Magasiva"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0357122/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914844/","name":"Reg Watson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1416718/","name":"Lara Radulovich"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer Wentworth Prison","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi872397593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZhN2EzOTYtYmJkNS00MzRjLTg5YmYtNDJjNjVhMDg4ZGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZhN2EzOTYtYmJkNS00MzRjLTg5YmYtNDJjNjVhMDg4ZGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Wentworth: Created by Reg Watson, Lara Radulovich. With Kate Atkinson, Katrina Milosevic, Robbie Magasiva, Jacqueline Brennan. Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2433738/","name":"Wentworth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDkxZmFhMDAtMmIyZS00NjAwLThlYjctZDQwMWQwYzdlYWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2433738/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mastas1"},"dateCreated":"2013-05-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great re-make of a classic Aussie drama","reviewBody":"Initial skepticism of trying to remake a classic serial drama like Prisoner was quickly dispelled in the first few minutes of episode 1. This is a completely new take on a long running series from the 1980s with the necessary level of added grit needed in 2013. Whilst employing many of the well known character names; the "new" version has created juicy variations to the originals. Those familiar with the original series should not allow themselves to by put off in the early stages by casting of different types to play the original characters. Ep 1 was edgy, well paced and the acting overall was very good. If Wentworth can maintain the same intensity over its remaining 9 episodes of season 1, it will be a treat to watch. As well as seeing how the initial variation to different main characters develop, perhaps growing into their more familiar traits from the original series as the new series progresses. Clearly this re-make is attempting to tell the background story as to how the likes of Bea Smith, Vera Bennett, Meg Jackson and Frankie Doyle came to be like they were in the original Prisoner series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20056,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-05-01","keywords":"jail,women in prison,prison,female prisoner,female convict","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040753/","name":"Kate Atkinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1319592/","name":"Katrina Milosevic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0535741/","name":"Robbie Magasiva"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0357122/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914844/","name":"Reg Watson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1416718/","name":"Lara Radulovich"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer Wentworth Prison","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi872397593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZhN2EzOTYtYmJkNS00MzRjLTg5YmYtNDJjNjVhMDg4ZGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZhN2EzOTYtYmJkNS00MzRjLTg5YmYtNDJjNjVhMDg4ZGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

The adventures of Professor Wolfe Kinteh, a crime scene investigator in the north of England." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt9169636/","name":"Wolfe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmU2NTdlNmQtYzg1ZC00MjExLWExNTQtZTEwMDNhNmJlMDMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQ1MDY0MjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The adventures of Professor Wolfe Kinteh, a crime scene investigator in the north of England.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9169636/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"sunbeamsfairy","dateCreated":"2021-09-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't understand the 6.4 rating","reviewBody":"There are so many great reviews on here I don't get the 6.4 rating?

This was great. I binged all 6 as wanted to see what happened each episode.

It's cleverly written , good acting and Wolfe is witty , so clever but watching him struggle with his mental health was hard at times. It makes him real though. The rest of the team all add to the program too. You can sense the family they have built themselves. Didn't take a genius to figure out D was upto something though. Hopefully there will be a season 2.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":937,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"genre":["Crime"],"datePublished":"2021-09-10","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1959501/","name":"Babou Ceesay","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1164730/","name":"Natalia Tena","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007893/","name":"Amanda Abbington"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0268392/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0716013/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi129942297","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg0NWEzMTItOWIxOS00ZjQ4LTkyMDItZGU3ZDYzZTA1Zjk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXN3aWZ0dw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg0NWEzMTItOWIxOS00ZjQ4LTkyMDItZGU3ZDYzZTA1Zjk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXN3aWZ0dw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The adventures of Professor Wolfe Kinteh, a crime scene investigator in the north of England."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wolfe
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 6: Wolfe ist damit einverstanden, den Fall von Dominiques Mutter wieder aufzurollen. Nach einer miskroskopischen Untersuchung muss er eine Fehleinschätzung eingestehen. 44 Min.GB 2021, mit Babou Ceesay, Natalia Tena, Amanda Abbington.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: Temple
programme.desc: 2. Staffel, Folge 3: Während Daniel für Gubby eine Operation durchführt, erfährt Beth, dass er von der Klinik suspendiert wurde. Eve bewirbt sich auf den früheren Job von Lee und erhält Zugang zum Tunnelsystem. 44 Min.GB 2020. Von Christopher Smith, mit Mark Strong, Michael Akinsulire, Emily Bevan.Ab 16 Jahren.

programme.title: Temple
programme.desc: 2. Staffel, Folge 4: Max verabschiedet sich mit einer Trauerfeier von seiner Schwester Suzana. Bei dieser Gelegenheit gibt er Daniel zu verstehen, dass er von Suzanas Niere weiß und verlangt von ihm die 50.000 Pfund. 44 Min.GB 2020. Von Tinge Krishnan, mit John Mackay, Julian Kostov, Mark Strong.Ab 12 Jahren.

programme.title: Wolfe
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 5: Nach einem Brand in einer Moschee entdeckt Wolfe, der gerade eine manische Phase hat, die Leiche des örtlichen Imams. Offenbar wurde er vor dem Ausbruch des Feuers ermordet. 46 Min.GB 2021, mit Babou Ceesay, Natalia Tena, Amanda Abbington.Ab 16 Jahren.

programme.title: Rock and a Hard Place
Rock and a Hard Place
programme.desc: Rock and a Hard Place: Directed by Jon Alpert, Matthew O'Neill. With Dwayne Johnson. A look at the Miami-Dade County Corrections and Rehabilitation Boot Camp Program, which allows young inmates undergo a strict 4 month course in order to learn from their past mistakes and make a better future for themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5348190/","name":"Rock and a Hard Place","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjUyYzNiNWQtZjZiMC00MDEwLWFiMDktZmNkNDZkM2U5ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDMwMzEyNzA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the Miami-Dade County Corrections and Rehabilitation Boot Camp Program, which allows young inmates undergo a strict 4 month course in order to learn from their past mistakes and make a better future for themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5348190/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"flynnmichael"},"dateCreated":"2017-03-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rock and a Hard Place","reviewBody":"Excellent documentary. I am happy to see a program of this nature succeed. Do not let Donald Trump see this. He will want to cut the funding.Hopefully these young men will be able to turn their lives around. I did not know that the Rock was a graduate of this program. It certainly did not do him any harm.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1031,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2017-03-27","keywords":"future","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0022412/","name":"Jon Alpert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2268713/","name":"Matthew O'Neill"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012712/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0536392/"}],"duration":"PT1H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Truman
Truman – Der Mann, der Geschichte schrieb
programme.desc:
Truman: Directed by Frank Pierson. With Gary Sinise, Diana Scarwid, Richard Dysart, Colm Feore. Though considered unqualified, Harry S. Truman becomes the 33rd president following the April 1945 death of Franklin D. Roosevelt." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114738/","name":"Truman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI3ZmYwOGQtNTc3OC00YjhhLWFkNzQtNTZlNGFiODI1ODkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Though considered unqualified, Harry S. Truman becomes the 33rd president following the April 1945 death of Franklin D. Roosevelt.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114738/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mstomaso"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Imperfect but good biographical sketch","reviewBody":"Harry Truman was an American president of rare integrity. Steadfastly honest and loyal to his friends, his causes, and his own heart, and born into a lower middle class farming family, Truman stands out as a real anomaly in 20th century American politics. Like similar men of profound integrity, such as John Adams, his presidency was a turbulent time of great triumphs for freedom and democracy and huge problems for ethics, nationalism and human rights. And as the symbol and scapegoat of those times, Truman, again like Adams, played his role - whether cast as hero or villain - with profound dignity. This film tells his story from his enlistment in the armed forces during World War One, at the age of 33, to his retirement from politics about 35 years later.

The characters of this film are portrayed sensitively and authentically. Truman and his wife, and the controversial Generals Marshall and MacArthur are particularly impressive. In some cases - particularly the Trumans themselves - this must have been a fairly difficult effort. Truman was not a very dramatic and flashy person, and his wife was fairly detached and private. Sinise and Scarwid play the parts and the relationship perfectly.

Since the study of history is a big part of my career, I am writing from a slightly unusual perspective. "Truman" has all the pedigree for what should have been a really powerful biographical film - a great lead actor, a solid supporting cast, a good production team, a great story and a very strong writing team. And it is refreshing to see such an accurate portrayal of a true hero of American politics and such a vivid realization of his times. Despite all of this, I feel that Truman could have been a better film - more dramatic, more visually powerful and more poignant. Somewhere between the script and the directing, a bit of cinematic art was lost and never quite recovered. Historiographically, this is a satisfying film, but it does not go too far past "satisfying".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2331,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-09-09","keywords":"character name as title,douglas macarthur character,franklin d. roosevelt character,the white house,harry s. truman character","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000641/","name":"Gary Sinise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0769311/","name":"Diana Scarwid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0246004/","name":"Richard Dysart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682757/","name":"Frank Pierson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114242/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567184/","name":"David McCullough"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0725564/","name":"Thomas Rickman"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

Roosevelt.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114738/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mstomaso","dateCreated":"2005-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Imperfect but good biographical sketch","reviewBody":"Harry Truman was an American president of rare integrity. Steadfastly honest and loyal to his friends, his causes, and his own heart, and born into a lower middle class farming family, Truman stands out as a real anomaly in 20th century American politics. Like similar men of profound integrity, such as John Adams, his presidency was a turbulent time of great triumphs for freedom and democracy and huge problems for ethics, nationalism and human rights. And as the symbol and scapegoat of those times, Truman, again like Adams, played his role - whether cast as hero or villain - with profound dignity. This film tells his story from his enlistment in the armed forces during World War One, at the age of 33, to his retirement from politics about 35 years later.

The characters of this film are portrayed sensitively and authentically. Truman and his wife, and the controversial Generals Marshall and MacArthur are particularly impressive. In some cases - particularly the Trumans themselves - this must have been a fairly difficult effort. Truman was not a very dramatic and flashy person, and his wife was fairly detached and private. Sinise and Scarwid play the parts and the relationship perfectly.

Since the study of history is a big part of my career, I am writing from a slightly unusual perspective. "Truman" has all the pedigree for what should have been a really powerful biographical film - a great lead actor, a solid supporting cast, a good production team, a great story and a very strong writing team. And it is refreshing to see such an accurate portrayal of a true hero of American politics and such a vivid realization of his times. Despite all of this, I feel that Truman could have been a better film - more dramatic, more visually powerful and more poignant. Somewhere between the script and the directing, a bit of cinematic art was lost and never quite recovered. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 5923012, Title: Here and Now, --- Description: Here and Now: Created by Alan Ball. With Tim Robbins, Holly Hunter, Daniel Zovatto, Jerrika Hinton. A dark dramedy about a progressive Portlandian family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Liberia, Vietnam and Colombia, and one biological daughter, who find their sanity tested and values challenged in 2018 America." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5923012/","name":"Here and Now","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDIwOTg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAxMzc1NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dark dramedy about a progressive Portlandian family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Liberia, Vietnam and Colombia, and one biological daughter, who find their sanity tested and values challenged in 2018 Americ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5923012/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"WorldProxy","dateCreated":"2020-11-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intriguing, Interesting, Well Written","reviewBody":"Six Feet Under (Alan Ball) brought me here. I was really disappointed it got cancelled. The characters were interesting, the stories were interesting, I enjoyed the social diversity and awareness of issues and how different groups reacted to everything. I liked the supernatural element and I'm a huge fan of Peter Macdissi. What I don't like is tricked out right-wingers who write reviews and are too stupid to understand that it's a TV show on HBO where you can have Gay, Muslim, Asian, Black, White, Latin, and homeless characters involved in relationships and have love for each other, but fail to mention the hate and racism of Nazi wannabe society, which by the way is a real problem in real life as well as in the show. If you're too sensitive and fragile for this sort of thing, then stick to whatever safe and insipid programs that appeal to your comfortable taste. Either that or shave your beard, lose the smelly red hat and grow a brain. I also think the show is self-aware, conscience, multi-layered, smart and definitely keeps you involved.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4733,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-02-11","keywords":"transvestite,racism,chlamydia,homophobia,progressivism","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000209/","name":"Tim Robbins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4683167/","name":"Daniel Zovatto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Premieres Tonight, 9/8c","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1020377113","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiMTdkOTktZjY1OS00ZWRmLWFmYzItOGU1OTcyMzlkNWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiMTdkOTktZjY1OS00ZWRmLWFmYzItOGU1OTcyMzlkNWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A multi-racial family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Somalia, Vietnam and Colombia and one biological child, find their bonds tested when one of the children begins seeing things which the rest cannot."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"plumberguy66","dateCreated":"2002-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Free Therapy","reviewBody":"As I was reading through the comments about Six Feet Under I was struck by how many people expressed how this series made them FEEL. And how many people admitted to tearing up or even crying while watching the show. I admit I have done the same.

From the very beginning no before that From the moment I heard that Six Feet Under was created by Alan Ball, I knew I would like this show. I figured how could the maker of American Beauty go wrong? Boy am I glad I figured that.

To some degree I can relate to all of the characters on the show. And that speaks volumes because all of the characters on the show are kinda messed up in the head. And that is what I think speaks to so many people. I mean before Donahue was the most popular show on TV, I don't think most Americans even knew the word dysfunctional' as applied to the family unit. Then it seemed a badge of honor to wear. And it was ok to go about telling people that you are from a dysfunctional family just to be in'. Now after all this time and openness about our dysfunction, we begin to see how very much alike we all are. And that I feel is one of the binding elements of the watchers to this program. We sit each week and watch, basically, a part of ourselves work through personal issues, prejudices and shortcomings. Not always pretty, not always successfully but always openly, to us, the viewers. For me, to watch these characters struggle through some of their problems (which usually make mine look like a day at the beach) and let us come along with them to learn about their weaknesses and fallibilities and humanness is a lot like therapy for me. And in the end it only costs the subscription rate for HBO (no, I don't work for them).

I have never been that attached to the boob-tube (my father's word for the television) before. I have never had a reason to be. The programs that where on never more that mildly held my attention until now. I HATE commercials, I think they speak down to the public. So now I have no excuses and for that I am grateful.

Bottom line: I'm looking forward to the next few sessions uhm I mean seasons. That's my take, what's yours?","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127863,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"plumberguy66","dateCreated":"2002-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Free Therapy","reviewBody":"As I was reading through the comments about Six Feet Under I was struck by how many people expressed how this series made them FEEL. And how many people admitted to tearing up or even crying while watching the show. I admit I have done the same.

From the very beginning no before that From the moment I heard that Six Feet Under was created by Alan Ball, I knew I would like this show. I figured how could the maker of American Beauty go wrong? Boy am I glad I figured that.

To some degree I can relate to all of the characters on the show. And that speaks volumes because all of the characters on the show are kinda messed up in the head. And that is what I think speaks to so many people. I mean before Donahue was the most popular show on TV, I don't think most Americans even knew the word dysfunctional' as applied to the family unit. Then it seemed a badge of honor to wear. And it was ok to go about telling people that you are from a dysfunctional family just to be in'. Now after all this time and openness about our dysfunction, we begin to see how very much alike we all are. And that I feel is one of the binding elements of the watchers to this program. We sit each week and watch, basically, a part of ourselves work through personal issues, prejudices and shortcomings. Not always pretty, not always successfully but always openly, to us, the viewers. For me, to watch these characters struggle through some of their problems (which usually make mine look like a day at the beach) and let us come along with them to learn about their weaknesses and fallibilities and humanness is a lot like therapy for me. And in the end it only costs the subscription rate for HBO (no, I don't work for them).

I have never been that attached to the boob-tube (my father's word for the television) before. I have never had a reason to be. The programs that where on never more that mildly held my attention until now. I HATE commercials, I think they speak down to the public. So now I have no excuses and for that I am grateful.

Bottom line: I'm looking forward to the next few sessions uhm I mean seasons. That's my take, what's yours?","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127863,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Terminal
Terminal
programme.desc:
Terminal: Directed by Vaughn Stein. With Margot Robbie, Simon Pegg, Dexter Fletcher, Mike Myers. A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4463816/","name":"Terminal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmEzOGVmNWQtZDBiMC00OTk4LTg3OWQtMzc2MzgxNjlkY2JjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4463816/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CANpatbuck3664"},"dateCreated":"2018-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Unbelievable Ending Makes Terminal Worth Checking Out","reviewBody":"Terminal was ripped to shreds by critics, I see why but I don't think they gave it enough credit. There's a lot of futuristic noir flourishes, the movie is bathing in neon light and seedy environments. This isn't new, its Blade Runner-esque but the cinematography is admittedly gorgeous in this. Just because it has been done before (lately with Altered Carbon and Mute) doesn't make it any less impressive. It was a nice touch and it deserves to be mentioned, even if it doesn't quite save the movie.

The plot of Terminal is very reminiscent of Guy Ritchie's movies. There's some Snatch or Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels moments but the whole movie doesn't operate as well overall. We get introduced to a bunch of seedy characters with dubious morals. They all come in and out of this train station in the middle of the night and the common thread between them is the character of Annie (Margot Robbie). She's an assassin who works part-time as a waitress and stripper. Through her comings and goings, we meet a terminally ill teacher Bill (Simon Pegg), a pair of mismatched hitmen Vince (Dexter Fletcher) and Alfred (Max Irons) and an odd janitor Clinton (Mike Myers). How these interactions play into the larger plot is a mystery to us until the final turn. The setup isn't bad, we've seen it before and although there are plot holes, none of them were bad enough to completely derail the movie. It was enough to keep me interested but I did find my attention drifting in and out because of the lack of cohesion. As a story, its very middle of the road for the genre.

Any heat for this movie was likely due to Margot Robbie's involvement as the main character. She keeps climbing the ladder and its deserved, she's great and I consider myself a fan of hers. She's good in Terminal, she's surprisingly committed, and she carries the movie capably. I do agree with some of the other reviewers in that she comes off as British Harley Quinn, but she didn't phone it in. Pegg is his typical charming self, he's very low-key in this but he works well with Robbie and I particularly enjoyed the montage that they share near the tail-end of the movie. Fletcher and Irons were odd, neither of them were terrible but Fletcher was over doing it and Irons was a little stiff. It was nice to see Mike Myers again and I think he did about as well as he could have with the material. Its a big distance from where his character starts to where he ends up and it makes his performance a little awkward by the end.

I was down the middle on Terminal for most of its run time for all the reasons listed above. It was never stellar, but it had its moments. I was more than ready to just let it float the rest of the way to whatever normal twist ending it had up its sleeve and call it a day. But when the confrontation comes between Annie and Bill, the movie doesn't just dip its toes into a pool of nonsense/crazy, it cannonballs into it. I wasn't just snickering, I was laughing when Terminal ended. Its not that the twist it takes is new, its handled in such a rough and implausible manner that I was shocked. But it didn't derail the movie for me, it actually improved it. It made Terminal memorable and while I would never say that this movie is good, its going to hold a place in my memory for insane plot twists.

I feel a little guilty for giving Terminal as high of a rating as I have. I liked the style of the movie and some of the performances (notably Robbie, Pegg and some of Myers) were solid. But it never reached high enough for something great and in any other movie, that twist ending would have knocked it down to a 3 or a 4/10. But that ending pushed the movie from mediocre to so bad its good territory for me. I can't call Terminal excellent but if you enjoy campy cinema, this is something you should see. I'm giving Terminal a 6/10 and I feel like I'm being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21313,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-05-11","keywords":"bare chested male bondage,tied to a bed,revenge,written by director,wager","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi671922201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU0Y2YwZDktYzc3Mi00ZjE3LWI3NmMtNjZiYmFlYTBlZTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU0Y2YwZDktYzc3Mi00ZjE3LWI3NmMtNjZiYmFlYTBlZTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the dark heart of a sprawling, anonymous city, 'Terminal' follows the twisting tales of two assassins carrying out a sinister mission, a teacher battling a fatal illness, an enigmatic janitor and a curious waitress leading a dangerous double life. Murderous consequences unravel in the dead of night as their lives all intertwine at the hands of a mysterious criminal mastermind hell-bent on revenge."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3053338/","name":"Margot Robbie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0670408/","name":"Simon Pegg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002077/","name":"Dexter Fletcher"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2389363/","name":"Vaughn Stein"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465725/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0482754/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303030/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2389363/","name":"Vaughn Stein"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Die Hard
Stirb langsam
programme.desc:
Die Hard: Directed by John McTiernan. With Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson, Paul Gleason. An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0095016/","name":"Die Hard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjRlNDUxZjAtOGQ4OC00OTNlLTgxNmQtYTBmMDgwZmNmNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0095016/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MadReviewer"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Perfect Modern Action Film","reviewBody":""Die Hard" is the prototype type for the modern action film. Since it's also one of the best action films ever made, that happens to be a very good thing. "Die Hard" is lean, mean, and doesn't contain a single second of wasted screen time. The direction, the action, the story, the acting . . . every aspect of this film comes close to big-budget action movie perfection. Since "Die Hard" was first released in 1988, it's difficult to think of a blockbuster action film that doesn't follow the basic structure and format of "Die Hard" . . . or, for that matter, is better than "Die Hard".

 "Die Hard" is about John McClane (Bruce Willis, in one of his all-time best film performances), a basically good, honest New York cop with a penchant for annoying authority figures. Traveling to Los Angeles in a last ditch attempt to patch things up with his estranged wife Holly (Bonnie Bedelia), John McClane suddenly finds himself involved in a hostage situation. Terrorists, led by the enigmatic Hans Gruber (Alan Rickman), have taken over the office building in which Holly is working, and with Gruber holding the upper hand over the LAPD and FBI forces in Los Angeles, it's up to John McClane to save the day . . . .

Kudos should be given to both director John McTiernan and screenwriters Jeb Stuart and Steven DeSouza -- the film is tight, electrifying, and clever, which is something few action films can ever claim. The story isn't completely believable, but it's believable enough, and it manages to move along at a quick enough pace to where the most glaring plotholes can easily be glossed over. There's also enough twists and wrinkles thrown into the story to keep the audience guessing as to what's going to happen next . . . and the surprises don't come out of left field, but are actually clever and well thought-out. (The fact that McClane often relies on his brains instead of his bullets to get out of his predicaments is also a big plus.) Simply put, "Die Hard" is one of the smartest and savviest action screenplays ever written. McTiernan holds up his end of the film admirably as well -- he uses the claustrophobic nature of the office building to great effect (particularly in any scene involving an elevator shaft), and he keeps the film rolling at a rollercoaster pace, building up the anticipation of the audience before unleashing the action. A lot of recent action films just fly along at a mindless, breakneck pace, without ever allowing the story to breathe or the suspense to build . . . unlike those films, "Die Hard" knows how to maximize the impact of each and every scene, and that's why it stands out so clearly from them all. With "Die Hard", John McTiernan puts on a perfect clinic as to how to pace an action movie.

As for the acting, it's darn near close to perfect. Bruce Willis is awesome as John McClane. As played by Willis, McClane's a smartass with a distinct disdain for being given orders . . . but McClane's also clever, and knows how to keep cool under pressure. There's more to McClane than the stereotypical tough guy hero. Fortunately, the role was given to Bruce Willis, who infuses McClane with the perfect mix of cocky arrogance and stone-cold heroism. The fact that Willis plays McClane as a man often in disbelief of his own situation, and who struggles in his fight against bad guys instead of just killing bad guys with ease, like most stereotypical action heroes -- well, not only does it make the character much more believable, it's darn brilliant. (The fact that Willis also knows how to deliver a deadpan one-liner better than anybody else in Hollywood makes the character all the better.) There's only a handful of movies where both character and actor are a completely perfect match; Bruce Willis as John McClane is one such perfect match.

Also worthy of mention is Alan Rickman's performance as the villain Hans Gruber. The Machiavellian Gruber would've been an easy villain to turn into little more than a scenery-chewing Bond villain . . . fortunately, Rickman doesn't travel the easy route. Gruber, as played by Rickman, is cold and calculating, and actually acts smart, instead of merely claiming to be smart and then being thoroughly outwitted by the hero. He always appears to have an ace hidden up his sleeve, and is so convincing at giving this impression, it's hard to tell throughout the film whether he or McClane truly have the upper hand. Other actors probably could've played Gruber fairly well, but Rickman makes Gruber one of the all-time great villains. As for the rest of the cast, they're all pretty good. Bonnie Bedelia does a nice job as John's soon-to-be-ex-wife Holly -- she plays her with enough smarts and feistiness to break the usual "damsel in distress" mold. It's also worth mentioning that Paul Gleason, who plays the obstinate police chief Robinson, pretty much sets up the modern action movie stereotype of the authority figure who refuses to heed the advice of the maverick hero. The character is stupid to a fault, and he's wonderful because of it.

"Die Hard" is a terrific example of what happens when all the pieces of a film fall together perfectly. There simply are no weak spots or dull moments in the film. Is "Die Hard" one of the best overall movies ever made? Probably not. But it's undeniably one of the best action movies ever made, and it just might well be the perfect modern action film.
